metadata.dc:title: Icelandic Saga Map
metadata.dc:creator: Emily Lethbridge
metadata.dc:description: The Icelandic Saga Map database contains geo-referenced texts in Icelandic and English, with specific emphasis on medieval Icelandic sagas. All geographical places mentioned in the texts are displayed on a map interface with the text alongside. Other data pertains to medieval and post-medieval parchment and paper manuscripts of the geo-referenced saga texts, and to Icelandic travel books.
metadata.dcterms:abstract: The Icelandic Saga Map database contains geo-referenced texts in Icelandic and English, with specific emphasis on medieval Icelandic sagas. All geographical places mentioned in the texts are displayed on a map interface with the text alongside.

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_id
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas ID
dcterms:hasPart.description: The unique saga identification number assigned in the Icelandic Saga Map (ISM)

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_name
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Name
dcterms:hasPart.description: Title of the written work (e.g. Laxdæla saga)

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_sagaid
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas ID
dcterms:hasPart.description: The unique saga identification number assigned in the Icelandic Saga Map (ISM)

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_saganame
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Name
dcterms:hasPart.description: Title of the written work (e.g. Laxdæla saga)

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_type
dcterms:hasPart.title: Place Type
dcterms:hasPart.description: This is Place Type and the field should be renamed as such. Type of physical place, whether natural or manmade (e.g. farm, valley, harbor, etc.)

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_chapter
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Chapter
dcterms:hasPart.description: Number of chapter within saga. (e.g. 1 kafli (Chapter 1))

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_action_start
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Action Start
dcterms:hasPart.description: Year in Common Era (CE) noting the beginning of action in the saga.

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_action_end
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Action End
dcterms:hasPart.description: Year in Common Era (CE) noting the beginning of action in the saga.

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_composition_start
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Composition Start
dcterms:hasPart.description: Year in Common Era (CE) marking earliest time of written composition for a text.

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_composition_end
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Composition End
dcterms:hasPart.description: Year in Common Era (CE) marking earliest time of written composition for a text.

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_oldest_manuscript
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Oldest Manuscript
dcterms:hasPart.description: Accession number for the oldest manuscript for this saga

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_oldest_manuscript_start
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Oldest Manuscript Start
dcterms:hasPart.description: Year in Common Era (CE) marking the earliest date of production of the oldest manuscript of given saga

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_oldest_manuscript_end
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Oldest Manuscript End
dcterms:hasPart.description: Year in Common Era (CE) marking the earliest date of production of the oldest manuscript of given saga

dcterms:hasPart.name: sagas_manuscript_link
dcterms:hasPart.title: Sagas Manuscript Link
dcterms:hasPart.description: URL to the online manuscript catalog with digital images and additional information

metadata.dc:subject: Documentary research
Dowsing Survey
metadata.dcterms:temporal: 750 CE - 2,017 CE (with focus on 750 CE - 1250 CE)
